class core.views.UserAllowedMixin¶

Bases: django.views.generic.detail.SingleObjectMixin

get_object(queryset=None)¶

Allows access to a proposal based on the status of a Proposal and the position of the User. He can be: - in the ‘SECRETARY’ or ‘COMMISSION’ group - an applicant of this Proposal - a supervisor of this Proposal If the status of the Proposal is not in line with the status of the User, a PermissionDenied is raised.

core.views.check_requires(*args, **kwargs)¶

This call checks whether a certain value requires another input to be filled.
